claude-sonnet.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude-sonnet.note: DEFAULT - Balanced quality/cost, uses subscription credits first

claude-opus.name: Claude Opus 4.6
claude-opus.note: PREMIUM - Best reasoning, uses subscription credits first

claude-haiku.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude-haiku.note: BUDGET - Fast and cheap, uses subscription credits first

glm-flash.name: GLM-4.7-Flash 30B
glm-flash.note: LOCAL - Free inference via LM Studio

gemini-3-pro.name: Gemini 3 Pro Preview
gemini-3-pro.note: COST-OPTIMIZER (PREFERRED) - 33% cheaper than Sonnet, 2M context, better reasoning

gemini-flash.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
gemini-flash.note: FALLBACK - 70% cheaper than Haiku, used when Gemini 3 unavailable (503 errors)

formatter.note: Haiku for formatting - 60x cheaper than Opus, uses subscription credits first

_note: Hybrid strategy: Haiku for interactive, Sonnet for default, Gemini 3 Pro for batch (fallback to 2.5 Flash if 503), GLM for code gen, Opus for critical reviews
